mapper.select: SELECT PC.PUB_CAT_CODE, PC.PUB_CAT, PO.PUB_CODE, PO.PUB_YN, PO.PUB_UNIT ,B.BOOK_CODE, B.BOOK_START, B.BOOK_END, B.BOOK_DATE ,M.MEM_CODE,M.IND_CODE, M.NAME, M.TEL,M.ID, M.PW, M.BUSINESS_NO ,M.ADDR ,M.EMAIL ,M.MEM_PLAN, M.SIGNUP_DATE FROM PUB_CAT PC, PUB_OFFICE PO, BOOKING B, MEMBER M WHERE PC.PUB_CAT_CODE = PO.PUB_CAT_CODE AND PO.PUB_CODE = B.PUB_CODE AND B.MEM_CODE = M.MEM_CODE AND PO.PUB_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKING(book_code,mem_code,pub_code, book_date, book_start, book_end, num_of_per) VALUES (s_book_code.nextval,#{memCode},#{pubCode}, TO_DATE(#{bookDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),TO_DATE(#{bookStart}, 'HH24:MI') ,TO_DATE(#{bookEnd}, 'HH24:MI') , #{numOfPer})
